content:
"The person who mentions OFA has to write an apology letter or email to the other person."

That will not work because we would just use PhraseExpress and not be genuine with our apology letters.

"The person who mentions OFA has to perform a random act of kindness for someone else."

That will not work because we won't believe each other without proof. Filming would take too mich time and be too complicated.

"The person who mentions OFA has to donate a small amount of money to a charity or cause that the other person supports."

That will not work because we are too poor.

"The person who mentions OFA has to go without their favorite snack or treat for a certain amount of time."

That will not work because we can't just start monitoring eachother that close.

Ask me 3-4 questions in order to gather information about the situation. After I have given my answers, suggest solutions or do whatever I say in the next prompt.
